attributes.action: Change the ingredients in Antifreeze to be unpalatable to cats and dogs!
attributes.additional_details: This has been going on too long and needs to STOP NOW!!!! Make it taste bitter so our pets don't drink it.
attributes.background: We have had a lot of poisoning of cats and some cases of dog poisoning in our small town due to anti freeze. UK wide this is a huge problem and people are losing their family pets which is heart-breaking for the owner and a very slow painful death for the animal.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions which are about something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. This would be the responsibility of the makers of antifreeze.
